taxon.author: (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1870)
taxon.distribution: USA, Caribbean to Brazil. Introduced to St. Helena

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1870b). Notes on some spiders and scorpions from St Helena, with descriptions of new species. Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 37(3, 1869): 531-544, pl. 42.
